snippet.title: Golden Rails: Small Town Story Collector's Edition
snippet.description:
Alawar Entertainment presents a rip-roaring follow-up to the original adventure in Golden Rails: Small Town Story Collector's Edition!

A land of opportunity lies before Jack and Jill as they start their well-earned vacation following their first adventure, but as their train rumbles along, the sounds of hoofbeats and gunshots welcome them to the lawless frontier! Before too long, they find themselves tasked with building a railroad to connect a troubled small town with the civilized world. But even as they tame the unforgiving terrain, Buford and his band of thieves stand in their way. Choose the best strategy to complete levels using an innovative bonus system as you rebuild settlements and keep the outlaws at bay. Along the way, you'll recruit the help of Native Americans, overcome clever challenges, and unlock surprising story twists in this rootin’-tootin' Time Management strategy game for all ages!

Download the Free Trial for PC!
http://bigfi.sh/golden-rails-ce

Available Now!
